sentences.english: AIM To determine the exact chemical structure of the main related substance in mosapride citrate.
sentences.chinese: 目的確定枸櫞酸莫沙必利有關雜質的結構。

sentences.english: Objective To study the molecular mechanism of swarming motility in Citrobacter freundii.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討弗氏枸櫞酸桿菌羣集運動的分子機制。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To improve the in vitro dissolution rate of sildenafil citrate tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高枸櫞酸西地那非片的體外溶出速率。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo prepare potassium citrate sustained-release tablets and study its in-vitro release mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 目的製備枸櫞酸鉀緩釋片並考查其體外釋放機制。

sentences.english: Objective To develop a quality standard of Citrus limon oils.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立藥用枸櫞油的質量標準。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of anticoagulants based on sodium citrate on the growth activity of malaria parasites.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解枸櫞酸鈉抗凝劑對瘧原蟲生長活性的影響。

sentences.english: Fentanyl citrate is used in the same manner as heroin.
sentences.chinese: 枸櫞酸芬太尼采用同樣的方法海洛因。

sentences.english: It's 10 years since the arrival of sildenafil citrate – or Viagra, as it is more commonly known.
sentences.chinese: 偉哥，即枸櫞酸西地那非，出現已經有10年的歷史。
